API Reference¶

news([page, return_type]) Returns metadata including the id, name and url of published releases produced by the Office of Public Outreach of the Space Telescope Science Institute.
news_release(which[, return_type]) Returns more detailed metadata including the abstract, image thumbnails, and more, of a published release.
image_collections([page, collection_name, …]) Returns metadata including the id, name, name of the associated news release, collection and mission of images from different collections available on the HubbleSite.
images(image_id[, return_type]) Returns more specific metadata of available images including the description, credits, the location of the image files and more.
video_collections([page, collection_name, …]) Returns metadata of published videos available on the HubbleSite including the video id, name, image, and the associated collection and mission.
videos(video_id[, return_type]) Returns more specific metadata and information on published videos available on the HubbleSite.
glossary([page, return_type]) Returns glossary terms and definitions related to astronomical objects and phenomena.
glossary_term(term[, return_type]) Returns a specific glossary term and its definition.
rss(feed_name[, page, sort, return_type]) Returns metadata and other information on published RSS news feeds produced by various international space agencies.
rss_posts(feed_name, pub_date[, return_type]) Returns individual RSS news feed posts for various international space agencies and organizations.
